echo_item.name: <y>Echo Item</c>
echo_item.description: Give a <y>temporary item</c>. But once you <r>stop using the skill</c>, there will be a period during which the skill can't be used

void_power.name: <y>Void Power</c>
void_power.description: The more <r>empty</c> skill slots, the more <r>power</c>!

life_burn.name: <y>Life Burn</c>
life_burn.description: Can <y>forcibly</c> trigger this skill by <r>burning your life</c>.

after_image.name: <y>After-Image</c>
after_image.description:
Focus briefly, channeling energy into an after-image. <b>All attacks are doubled</c>. 
Stacks twice. Its during depends on the skill's <y>cooldown</c>

fragile.name: <y>Fragile</c>
fragile.description: Greatly increases the skill's <y>damage</c>, but each <r>use</c> may cause the skill to <r>fracture</c>.

evolving_hunger.name: <y>Evolving Hunger</c>
evolving_hunger.description: A relentless desire for power that <r>devours</c> its host, <y>growing</c> with each use.

totem_of_undying.name: <y>Totem of Undying</c>
totem_of_undying.description: When the player receives <r>fatal damage</c>, revive the player and <r>break</c> the skill.

time_dilation.name: <y>Time Dilation</c>
time_dilation.description: After <r>using</c> this skill, the time flow of <r>everything</c> except players is <y>temporarily slowed</c>, while players will <y>speed up</c>.

entropy.name: <y>Entropy</c>
entropy.description: When this skill <r>gains a stack</c>, it <y>randomly transforms</c> into another skill.

fire_trail.name: <y>Fire Trail</c>
fire_trail.description: After <r>using</c> this skill, a <y>blazing trail</c> follows you <r>temporarily</c>, scorching everything in its path.

explosive_shot.name: <y>Explosive Shot</c>
explosive_shot.description: After <r>using</c> this skill, your attacks are <r>temporarily</c> infused with <y>explosive</c> power.

lightning.name: <y>Lightning</c>
lightning.description: After <r>using</c> this skill, your attacks are <r>temporarily</c> infused with <y>lightning</c> power.

teleport.name: <y>Teleport</c>
teleport.description: After <r>drop</c> this skill, you will get a new skill to <y>teleport</c> to this skill.

blood_lust.name: <y>Blood Lust</c>
blood_lust.description: <r>Slay</c> your enemies to quench your thirst for blood, <y>restoring health</c> with every kill.

endest_reap.name: <y>Endest Reap</c>
endest_reap.description: <r>Defeat a boss</c> to harvest their power, increasing your skill <y>damage</c> with every kill.

perpetual_strike.name: <y>Perpetual Strike</c>
perpetual_strike.description: Relentless and unyielding, this skill's <y>damage</c> increases with every <r>consecutive</c> hit on the <r>same</c> enemy.
